April 25, 2004 D SCABA Spring Contest (First Section)
SCABA Spring Contest (First Section) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SCABA Spring Contest scaba-spring-contest-first-section
Town Hall, Hove, Sussex Best March - Becontree Brass Best Basses - Horsham Borough Best Horns - BAE Systems Best Tenor Trombone - Horsham Borough Best Bass Trombone - Becontree Brass Conductors Prize - Glenton Bacon, Horsham Borough
Oct. 19, 2013, 8:50 p.m. March 23, 2017, 4:30 p.m.

2 Yiewsley and West Drayton Band Chris Cole
